sentences.en: A rowing competition is called a regatta.
Attracts many Henley Royal Regatta entrants both domestic and international.
sentences.cn: 吸引国内、国际的许多亨德森皇室成员赛船会进入者.

sentences.en: Foreign military officials attending the regatta toured a Song - class diesel - electric submarine.
sentences.cn: 参加此次阅舰式的外军军官们参观了一艘宋级柴电潜艇.

sentences.en: The Cowes regatta is the longest - running regular yachting regatta in the world.
sentences.cn: 考斯赛舟会是世界上航程最远的固定赛舟会.

sentences.en: The regatta, tennis club sport and other Sports Class themes emphasized elegance plus good grooming.
sentences.cn: 赛舟会,网球,棒球和其他运动强调了高雅和好的整饰.

sentences.en: This site will tell you everything you need to know about Hammersmith London Regatta.
sentences.cn: 这个地点将告诉你你需要关于铁匠伦敦赛船会知道的一切.

sentences.en: Von Sloneker met her when he came to Edgartown for the regatta.
sentences.cn: 冯斯隆尼克到埃德加城参加赛艇的时候遇见了她.

sentences.en: We'll take part in a regatta next month.
sentences.cn: 下个月我们将参加一场划船比赛.

trans.tran_en: a sports event at which there are races for rowing boats or sailing boats
